overview: A modern drama depicting The Fourth Joyful Mystery of the Rosary, The Presentation in the Temple, from the life of Jesus.  "I see Christ in you." This one simple statement of faith moves Robert from worrying more about what his friends think to seeing Christ in himself and others. The inspiring story of a rebellious teen belligerently performing community service and how he is challenged by a nursing home resident to be Christ to others.
title: You Will See
